cache

Class Cache

  • java.lang.Object
    • cache.Cache

  • public class Cache
extends java.lang.Object
    Cache memory.

    • Field Detail

      • acceptedMap

        public static Wrapper<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> acceptedMap
        Represents all accepted agents.

        Map Key-> The hash key of Software Agent

        Map Value-> An array of Strings containing the following information:

        • String[] agent = new String[9];
        • agent[0] -> Hostname
        • agent[1] -> Ip Address
        • agent[2] -> Mac Address
        • agent[3] -> OS Version
        • agent[4] -> Nmap Version
        • agent[5] -> Hash Key
        • agent[6] -> Status ( Online | Offline )
        • agent[7] -> Time of last request
        • agent[8] -> ID assigned by the database

      • pendingMap

        public static Wrapper<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> pendingMap
        Represents all pending agents.

        Map Key-> The hash key of Software Agent

        Map Value-> An array of Strings containing the following information:

        • String[] agent = new String[9];
        • agent[0] -> Hostname
        • agent[1] -> Ip Address
        • agent[2] -> Mac Address
        • agent[3] -> OS Version
        • agent[4] -> Nmap Version
        • agent[5] -> Hash Key
        • agent[6] -> Status ( Online | Offline )
        • agent[7] -> Time of last request
        • agent[8] -> ID assigned by the database

      • resultMap

        public static Wrapper<java.lang.String,WrapperList> resultMap
        Represents the job results owned by each Software Agent.

        Map Key-> The hash key of Software Agent

        Map Value-> A list of String[] containing the following info:

        • String[] results = new String[3];
        • results[0] = Job ID assigned by the database
        • results[1] = Result ID assigned by the database
        • results[2] = Time when received this result

      • xmlMap

        public static Wrapper<java.lang.String,WrapperList> xmlMap
        Represents the unmarshalled results for each job.

        Map Key-> The result ID assigned by the database.

        Map Value-> A list of String[] containing the unmarshalled info

      • periodicMap

        public static Wrapper<java.lang.String,Wrapper<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]>> periodicMap
        Represents the periodic jobs assigned for each Software Agent.

        Map Key-> The hash key of Software Agent

        Map Value-> A Map containing the jobs with the following description:

        • Map Key: The jod ID assigned by the database
        • Map Value: An array of Strings containing the following information
          • String[] job = new String[4];
          • job[0] -> ID assigned by the database
          • job[1] -> Execute flags
          • job[2] -> Periodic flag
          • job[3] -> Periodic time

      • onetimeMap

        public static Wrapper<java.lang.String,Wrapper<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]>> onetimeMap

        Map Key-> The hash key of Software Agent

        Map Value-> A Map containing the jobs with the following description:

        • Map Key: The jod ID assigned by the database

          • job[1] -> Execute flags
          • job[2] -> Periodic flag
          • job[3] -> Periodic time

        public static Wrapper<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> pendingAndroid

        • String[] android = new String[2];
        • android[0] -> username
        • android[1] -> password
